title: FS: 1890 N172 Old Judge Denny -- rare!
author: trdcrdkid

posts.post_title: FS: 1890 N172 Old Judge Denny -- rare!
posts.post_content:
FS: N172 OJ Jerry Denny, New York (1890). Looking for $500 or best offer.

This is rebacked, as you can see from the pictures, but 1890 Old Judges are very scarce. It's very hard to know how to price this, so I'm just going to put it out there and see what interest there is. I welcome reasonable offers.

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53956983115_ff2370d54d_k.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53955635772_960ec53211_k.jpg[/IMG]
